lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re ''Outscalping the Scalpers'' (editorial, Nov. 6): I would have more faith in the motives of the producers of ''The Producers'' if they would donate to a worthy charity the entire difference between the face value of the 50 tickets, which is $100 each, and the proceeds from the ''anti-scalper'' price of $480.
abstract: Wade Stone letter comments on November 6 editorial scoring high price of tickets for Broadway musical The Producers
